text: Chepe Fortuna is a Colombian soap opera produced by RCN Televisión. Its mains stars are model and runner up for Miss Universe Taliana Vargas and model and actor Javier Jattin, both of them born in Colombia. With them, there is a complete casting of very well known Colombian actors and actresses. The soap opera takes place in Colombian North Coast. Scripts were created by Miguel Angel Baquero and Eloisa Infante and direction is made by Mario Ribero, who also directed soap operas like Los Reyes and I'm Betty, the ugly, Colombian (and original) version of Ugly Betty. == Cast == * Javier Jattin - José "Chepe" Fortuna. * Taliana Vargas - Niña Cabrales. * Pedro Palacio - Aníbal Conrado. * Susana Rojas - Yadira Cienfuegos. * Carlos Muñoz - Jeremías Cabrales. * Consuelo Luzardo - Alfonsina Pumarejo. * Judy Henríquez -
